mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_log (log_type, user_id, phone, user_name, login_status, token, token_expire_time, create_time, ip, version, device_id, platform, channel, comment) VALUES (#{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tokenExpireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_log SET log_type = #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_status = #{loginStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, token_expire_time = #{tokenExpireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
